Title: A Day in the Life
Plot: Chief Tyrol and his wife Cally become trapped in a malfunctioning airlock.Adama remembers his late wife Carolanne as he marks his wedding anniversary. His relationship with President Roslin continues to become more friendly and personal.
GuestStars: Bodie Olmos, Michael Leisen, Lucinda Jenney, Alessandro Juliani, Kandyse McClure, Finn Devit, Nicki Clyne
